This policy describes the types of
information we may collect or that you may provide when you use the
SmarterContracts Plugin ("Plugin") and our practices for collecting, using,
maintaining, protecting, and disclosing that information.

Information You Provide to Us:

Automatic Data Collection:

We do not automatically collect personal data about you or your device.

We do not
knowingly collect personal information from children under 13.
sharing:
